keyboardNavigation.notes: Perfect keyboard navigation. Enter and Space keys activate button. Tab navigation works correctly. Disabled buttons properly handled.

screenReaderSupport.notes: Native button element with implicit role. Full support for aria-label, aria-pressed, aria-expanded, aria-controls, aria-describedby. Loading state can use aria-busy.

visualAccessibility.notes: Meets AA contrast standards (4.5:1). Focus indicators clearly visible. Ripple animation respects prefers-reduced-motion. AAA contrast (7:1) needs verification.

ariaCompliance.notes: Full ARIA support. Native button role. Supports all standard button ARIA attributes (aria-label, aria-pressed, aria-expanded, aria-controls, aria-describedby, aria-haspopup).

strengths: Native <button> element provides robust accessibility foundation
Perfect keyboard navigation with Enter and Space key support
Excellent focus management with visible focus indicators
Full screen reader support with proper ARIA attributes
Supports all button types (submit, button, reset)
Loading state properly communicated via aria-busy
Disabled state correctly implemented with disabled attribute
Icon-only buttons support aria-label for screen readers
Ripple animation respects user motion preferences
Touch target sizes meet AA requirements (24×24px)
Proper form integration with form attribute support
Full support for custom ARIA attributes
Color contrast meets WCAG AA standards (4.5:1)

issuesFound.description: Enhanced contrast (7:1) not verified for all button variants
issuesFound.impact: Users with low vision may have difficulty reading text on some button types
issuesFound.suggestion: Verify all button variants (PRIMARY, SECONDARY, DANGER, SUCCESS) meet 7:1 contrast ratio for AAA compliance. Document specific ratios for each variant.

issuesFound.description: Touch target size not verified for 44×44px AAA requirement
issuesFound.impact: Users with motor disabilities may have difficulty with smaller buttons
issuesFound.suggestion: Verify all button sizes (SMALL, MEDIUM, LARGE) meet minimum 44×44px for AAA. Document actual pixel measurements for each size variant.

recommendations: Verify and document color contrast ratios for all button variants to confirm AAA compliance (7:1)
